SEARCH
Package com.butlert.tradingcardmanager.utils

Class ReadTextFile

java.lang.Object
com.butlert.tradingcardmanager.utils.ReadTextFile
@Component public class ReadTextFile extends Object
Timothy Butler CEN 3024 - Software Development 1 June 18, 2025 ReadTextFile.java This class is responsible for reading a text file line-by-line and returning the contents as a list of strings. It abstracts file I/O operations to make future transitions to GUI-based file input seamless and isolated.

  • Field Details

    • logger

      private static final Logger logger
      Logger instance for recording application events and errors in the DatabaseConnectionController.

      Uses SLF4J's LoggerFactory for standardized logging. Helps in debugging and tracing database connection handling.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReadTextFile

      public ReadTextFile()
      Constructs a ReadTextFile component.

      This default constructor is provided for Spring to instantiate this utility as a component.

  • Method Details

    • readLines

      public List<String> readLines(String filePath)
      Reads all lines from a given file path and returns them as a list of strings.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the text file
      Returns:
      a list of strings, each representing a line from the file
      Throws:
      CardImportException - if the file cannot be read
